page.description: The UI_GET_PROPERTY_NAME() function displays a dialog box with that lets you select any object property and view its current value.
page.syntax: Data as C = ui_get_property_name(C objectname [,C default_value [,C title [,C style [,N width ]]]])

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The value of the selected object property.

argument.name: objectname
argument.description: The name of an object on a layout.

argument.name: default_value
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The default property selection.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: style
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". Any non-null value displays a drop-down list.

argument.name: width
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0. The width of the dialog in characters.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example attached to a button a form displays the properties of the embedded browse named browse1.
